synopsis.text: After their impressive victory over reigning champions Hakone Academy at the Interhigh national bicycle race, the Sohoku High racing club enters a period of transition. With the retirement of senior members Kinjou, Makishima and Tadokoro, a new team leadership emerges centered around second-year captain Teshima Junta and vice-captain Aoyagi Hajime. Joining them are talented first-years Onoda Sakamichi, Imaizumi Shunsuke and Naruko Shoukichi, eager to defend their national title. However, rival Hakone Academy aims to reclaim their glory by recruiting promising new riders. Additionally, the monstrous racer Midousuji Akira now leads the competitive Kyoto Fushimi High team. As the nation's elite cycling programs hone their skills, the race to the top intensifies. Sohoku's bonded team must continue pushing their limits if they hope to achieve consecutive championships.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
